item.title: Tentakel on CentOS 6 / Python 2.6
item.description: You probably already know this old, unmaintained but incredibly useful software:Â tentakel. If not check it out, you might like it. There are two issues we need to tackle: 1. Tentakel uses tpg but the bundled version is not compatible with python 2.6 Error thrown: return self.lexer[start:stop] TypeError: object cannot be interpreted as an index The fix is to download this version of tpg from it’s developer: http://cdsoft.fr/tpg/TPG-3.1.2.tar.gz From this archive extract tpg.
